<a id="VisualShaderNodeCompare"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeCompare

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A comparison function for common types within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Compares ``a`` and ``b`` of [type](VisualShaderNodeCompare.md#VisualShaderNodeCompare_property_type) by [function](VisualShaderNodeCompare.md#VisualShaderNodeCompare_property_function). Returns a boolean scalar. Translates to ``if`` instruction in shader code.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
